name: pragueblockchainweek
author: Makoto Inoue (forked from the version by Josef Jelacic

scripts.deploy:branch: /bin/sh -c 'if [ "$TRAVIS_BRANCH" = "master" ]; then yarn deploy:live; elif [ "$TRAVIS_BRANCH" = "dev" ]; then yarn deploy:dev; fi'
scripts.deploy: /bin/sh -c 'if [ "$TRAVIS_PULL_REQUEST" = "false" ]; then yarn deploy:branch; else yarn deploy:pr; fi'
